q2: Who should they replace him with?
a2: I'm not sure. But I hope they are looking for someone
q3: Will Manchester United take the league title this year?
a3: Manchester United achieved their highest points total and league placing since the retirement of Sir Alex Ferguson in 2013, amassing 81 points to finish second in the Premier League, so yes!
a4: He was knighted in the 1999 Queen's Birthday Honours list, for his services to the game and Manchester United
q5: Will Paul Pogba leave Manchester United?
a5: No. He has too high a price tag for another team to buy him right now.
